mapper.select: select dep_name, job_name, emp_name, dc.* from document dc left join employee e on dc.writer = e.emp_no left join department d on e.emp_dept = d.dep_no left join jobtitle j on e.emp_job = j.job_no where doc_no = #{docNo}
select dl.*, e.emp_name, j.job_name from docline dl left join employee e on dl.approver = e.emp_no left join jobtitle j on e.emp_job = j.job_no where doc_no = #{doc_no} order by lv

select d.doc_no, d.title, e.emp_name writer_name, d.request_date, d.end_date from document d left join docline dl on d.doc_no = dl.doc_no left join employee e on dl.approver = e.emp_no where approver = #{id} and d.doc_no = #{docNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into document( doc_no, title, writer, content ) values( seq_doc_no.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content} )
select seq_doc_no.currval from dual
insert into docline( doc_no, approver, approver_type, lv, status, max_authority ) values( #{docNo}, #{approver}, #{approverType}, #{lv}, #{status}, #{maxAuthority} )
insert into DocAttach( no, doc_no, original_filename, renamed_filename ) values( seq_docAttach_no.nextval, #{docNo}, #{originalFilename}, #{renamedFilename} )
insert into docReply( no, doc_no, writer, content, reg_date ) values( seq_docReply_no.nextval, #{docNo}, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select e.emp_name writer_name, d.dep_name, j.job_name, dr.* from docReply dr join employee e on dr.writer = e.emp_no join department d on e.emp_dept = d.dep_no join jobtitle j on e.emp_job = j.job_no where doc_no = #{docNo}
mapper.insert: insert into docForm( no, title, content, type ) values( seq_docForm_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{type} )
mapper.select: select no, title, type from docForm
